description.raw:
We are going to use ignition citadel (c++17) dependencies with gazebo11, which requires bionic, so I've copied the logic from ignition.dsl to create the `ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto` and `abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto` jobs.

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/_dsl_gazebo/571/
* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/_dsl_gazebo/573/

I've also added logic to use gcc8 for gazebo >= 11 and am testing with a  pipeline script added in the following pull request:

* https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/3137/bitbucket-pipelinesyml-for-gazebo11-using/diff
* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-none&build=7)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-none/7/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-none/7/

~~We'll need to update the bitjen daemon to trigger the new jenkins jobs once this is merged.~~ Never mind, I think it will work fine either way.
description.html:
We are going to use ignition citadel (c++17) dependencies with gazebo11, which requires bionic, so I've copied the logic from ignition.dsl to create the ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto and abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto jobs.

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/_dsl_gazebo/571/
  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/_dsl_gazebo/573/

I've also added logic to use gcc8 for gazebo >= 11 and am testing with a pipeline script added in the following pull request:

  • https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/3137/bitbucket-pipelinesyml-for-gazebo11-using/diff
  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-none/7/

We'll need to update the bitjen daemon to trigger the new jenkins jobs once this is merged. Never mind, I think it will work fine either way.

summary.html:
We are going to use ignition citadel (c++17) dependencies with gazebo11, which requires bionic, so I've copied the logic from ignition.dsl to create the ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto and abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto jobs.

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/_dsl_gazebo/571/
  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/_dsl_gazebo/573/

I've also added logic to use gcc8 for gazebo >= 11 and am testing with a pipeline script added in the following pull request:

  • https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/3137/bitbucket-pipelinesyml-for-gazebo11-using/diff
  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-none/7/

We'll need to update the bitjen daemon to trigger the new jenkins jobs once this is merged. Never mind, I think it will work fine either way.
